英文法規名稱: Standards for the Approval Fee of Applications for the Establishment of an FM Radio Station
中文法規名稱: 申請許可設立調頻廣播電臺審查費收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Article 1-5 promulgated the by GIO, Executive Yuan, Hsin Guan Er Zi No 0940624269Z on August 18th, 2005; implemented on the day of its promulgation.
2.Abolition of this set of Regulations was announced by the National Communications Commission on March 22, 2018, under Order Tung-chuan-nei-jung No. 10748006820

法規內容.條文內容: These standards are promulgated in accordance with Article 50-1 of the Radio and Television Act.

The approval fee of these standards shall be calculated in New Taiwan Dollars. The fees are as follows:
I. Application fee for the establishment of an FM radio station (B) or sub-units: NTD150,000 per application.
II. Application fee for the establishment of an FM radio station (A): NTD50,000 per application.
According to the notice from the competent authority, there shall be no additional charges for applications submitted within the deadline.
Once paid, the approval fees, including those that have been mistakenly paid or over paid, shall not be refunded.
These standards shall become effective from the day of their promulgation.
